subject: Order #SSN4628
description_text:
Hello, 
 
 I ordered the pedals with motors according to the order number (Order #SSN4628). 
 
 They arrived today, but unfortunately the motors are missing. 
 I kindly request that you send them as soon as possible. 
 
 I can take pictures for you if you wish. 
 
 Merry Christmas

conversations.body_text: Hi Danny-mueller97,  I apologize for the delayed response.  I see your order was shipped in two separate packages, both of which have now arrived. Have you received the items yet?  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=00340434776544040757,JSELW1117237301YQ

hello, 
 
 yes, i received it a few days later. 
 
 Thanks 
 
 
 Gesendet: Freitag, 16. Januar 2026 um 04:36
Hi Danny-mueller97,  I'm glad to hear that you received it.Thank you for your inquiry. Should you have any questions, please feel free to contact us anytime. We will respond as soon as possible.
